outputs.output_descr:
Streamlined and comprehensive market-oriented energy policy and legal/regulatory framework for PV on-grid electricity generation
Capacity available to evaluate the economic and financial viability of grid-connected PV projects, leverage investments through conducive feed-in tariffs, develop financial incentives, appropriate guarantee, risk mitigation instruments and formulate carbon finance options.
Capacity available within various institutions to update/expand coverage of solar radiation data, design, evaluate, monitor and implement
projects, and provide maintenance and repair services.
Addition of at least 3 MW of PV capacity.
Outreach programme, monitoring and project experience/best practices/lessons learned for replication throughout the country/region.
outputs.output_title: Removal of Barriers to Solar P

project_descr: Removal of Barriers to Solar PV Power Generation in Mauritius, Rodrigues and the Outer Islands.
project_title: Removal of Barriers to Solar PV Power Generation MRU
